title: (x) Books of Lasting Value italic serif face - Artcraft {Alessandro S}
content:
Does anyone recognize this typeface from an old book? I can’t place it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194757im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/books_3929.gif)

 [‹ (x) "Vid himlens utkant" movie poster - Compacta {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194757/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39126 "Go to previous forum topic") [constructed geometric face on Ken Garland's Illustrated Graphics Glossary cover ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194757/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38987 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tonie Blaze

comments.content:
I think Artcraft by Robert Wiebking, circa 1913.  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/urw/artcraft\_urw\_bold\_ot\_std/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194757/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/urw/artcraft_urw_bold_ot_std/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/urw/artcraft\_urw\_bold\_ot\_std/")
Thanks, but do you know of an italic version of the font anywhere?

Matt Jalbert created an italic version.

[http://www.exuberance.com/type/artcraft.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194757/http:/www.exuberance.com/type/artcraft.html "http://www.exuberance.com/type/artcraft.html")
